title: Hooray for the Farmer's Market!
description: When a grocery store is such a fun place for children to visit, wouldn't a farmer's market be an even more exciting destination for them? Hooray for the Farmer's Market! illustrates many reasons that farmer's markets are appealing places to visit-meeting artists, eating freshly baked foods, and listening to bands are just a few. The book, which introduces an environment that may be unfamiliar to many students, incorporates useful vocabulary and charming pictures.
meta: artist, baker, band, farmer, gardener, market
Use the reading strategy of visualizing to understand text
Long Vowel Sounds : Discriminate medial long /a/ vowel sound
VCe Pattern : Identify the VCe pattern
Capitalization and Punctuation : Capitalize sentence beginnings and punctuate sentence endings
Suffixes : Understand and apply the suffix -er

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
